name: Cubic Blocks Maze Run 3D
description:
For unknown reason you happen to be locked into some strange and scary labyrinth. Everything is made from bricks and cubes, you don't have a map or weapon – who knows, what you can find in the hear of this maze? Who can you meet? Are you here alone? Cubic Blocks Maze Run 3D – addictive and even terrifying mazerunner.

First, you can complete tutorial to understand basic rules. Then, enjoy exploring this horror maze and try to survive and escape. Good luck you!

Cubic Blocks Maze Run 3D game features:
• 3D labyrinth;
• First person maze runner;
• Cube graphics;
• Amazing sounds;
• Tutorial and levels with rising difficulty.

Cubic Blocks Maze Run 3D – amazing cube maze challenge! Explore the scary maze and have fun!
